summary: Implements a runner that orchestrates scanning of Docker images for security vulnerabilities and license issues. It extracts image references, interacts with the Bridgecrew image scanner (including optional TwistCLI), caches scan results, respects ignore configurations, merges findings into a unified report, and integrates with the broader Checkov reporting framework.
business_intent: Enable automated security and compliance assessment of container images in development and CI/CD workflows, helping organizations identify and remediate vulnerable or nonâ€‘compliant dependencies before deployment.
